effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.6 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 751,707.
Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.6 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 751,707.
Set: When you cast Surging Totem, 2 allies in the radius have Insurance! applied to them. When Insurance! is consumed, your next Chain Heal, Healing Surge, or Healing Wave is increased by 10%.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 103,924 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,278 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 191 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Sharas'dal, Scepter of Tides
Shield of the Sea Queen
